channel.description: Recent content in blogpost on Zombdata

item.title: Zombdata is coming to town
item.description: Hi! In this first post I will tell you a bit about this project, and what to expect from it in the short and mid term. I love zombie-related material as much as I love making lists^[At 8 years I made a list of all cars I had seen, classified by brand, country, and year. I didn't even like cars]. Some time ago I started making a list of all zombie films I'd like to watch.
